title: 10-night Fly & Tour: Vietnam Express Southbound
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City
Accommodation: Hotel (7 nights), Overnight boat (1 night), Overnight sleeper train (1 night)

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City to Auckland

other.notes: Additional activities and transfers not included in DIY breakdown.

reasoning: The package includes flights, accommodation, meals, and activities, which are significantly cheaper than booking separately. The estimated savings are substantial.
additional_notes: Consideration of additional activities and transfers may affect total costs.
